pages.text: Advanced Laser Connectors work just like $(l:laserio:laser_connector)Laser Connectors$(/l), connecting to other (basic) connectors and nodes up to 8 blocks away. $(br2)They can only be connected to one other Advanced Connector, however, forming a pair.  The connection range from one advanced connector to its partner is infinite - including across dimensions!

pages.title: Adv. Connector
pages.text: Two Advanced Connectors linked to each other

If an Advanced Connector already has a partner, and you attempt to pair it with a new partner, the original connection will be broken to form the new connection.  $(br2)When looking at the block with the $(l:laserio:laser_wrench)Laser Wrench$(/l) in your hand, you'll see the coordindates of the partner block.

pages.title: Partner Coordindates
pages.text: Showing the coordinates of the partner connector
Advanced Laser Connectors do NOT chunk load for you. You are responsible for handling all chunk loading on your own! Nodes in unloaded chunks will not operate.
